SA20n1387:3250: vyāyacchata iti vistareṇa caturbhiḥ samyakprahāṇaiḥ prayujyate |
SA20n1387:3263: tatra smṛtiryā navākārā navākārāyāścittasthiteḥ śamathapakṣyāyāḥ saṃgrāhikā |
SA20n1387:3268: mānasya yaścittābhisaṃskāraḥ śamathavipaśyanānukūlaḥ kāyakarma vākkarma samutthāpayati |
SA20n1387:3270: ābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ prahīṇatāmanuśayānāṃ paricchinatti jānāti |
SA20n1387:3279: yā ca praśrabdhiryā ca smṛtiryacca saṃprajanyaṃ |
SA20n1387:3313: pareṣāṃ cādhigame śāstuḥ śrāvakāṇāṃ ca yo[a]bhisaṃpratyayaḥ |
SA20n1387:3319: ye [a]pi te vīryādayaḥ teṣāmapi lokottaradharmotpattaye ādhipatyaṃ |
SA20n1387:3336: sahadharmeṇa kleśaparyavasthānena vā tena sā anavamṛdyetyucyate |
SA20n1387:3338: taiḥ sa balairbalavān sarvvaṃ mārabalaṃ vijitya prayujyate |
SA20n1387:3354: tānyatra samyakprahāṇānyabhipretāni tāni hyatyantatāyai pāpakānāmakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya samvarttante ||
SA20n1387:3355: tatra smṛtīndriyaṃ caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu draṣṭavyamitīmāni catvāri smṛtyupasthānānyaviśeṣaviśeṣa viparyāsaprahāṇāya samvarttante |
SA20n1387:3386: yathā abhimanthana vyāyāma evaṃ pañcānāmindriyāṇāmāsevanā draṣṭavyā |
SA20n1387:3387: yathā adharaṇyā tatprathamata eva ūṣmagataṃ bhavati |
SA20n1387:3393: yathā dhūmaprādurbhāva evaṃ satyānulomāḥ kṣāntayo draṣṭavyāḥ ||
SA20n1387:3394: yathāgneḥ patanaṃ nirarcciṣa evaṃ laukikā agradharmā draṣṭavyāḥ |
SA20n1387:3396: ) utpāda evaṃ lokottarā anāsravā dharmā draṣṭavyā ( |
SA20n1387:3409: tatra yā ca praśrabdhiryaśca samārdhiyā copekṣā itīmāni trīṇi śamathapakṣyāṇi [ | ]
SA20n1387:3412: sa tasmin samaye tatprathamato bodhyaṃgalābhācchaikṣo bhavati |
SA20n1387:3416: sa teṣāṃ prahāṇāya triskandhamāryāṣṭaṃgaṃ mārgaṃ bhāvayati |
SA20n1387:3426: āryasya śaikṣasya dṛṣṭapadasyāyaṃ mārga iyaṃ pratipadaṣṭābhiraṃgaiḥ saṃgṛhītā (ḥ) ||
SA20n1387:3431: pratilabhya ca yattasyaiva prajñayā vyavasthānaṃ karoti ||
SA20n1387:3452: vihāragato vā punaḥ paryeṣiteṣu cīvarādiṣu gate,
SA20n1387:3461: te anena pūrvvameva manaskāralābhādbodhyaṃgaireva saha labdhā bhavanti |
SA20n1387:3463: kena kāraṇena dīrgha kālaṃ hyetadāryāṇāṃ satāṃ samyaggatānāmiṣṭaṃ kāntaṃ priyaṃ mana āpaṃ kaccidahaṃ tadvāgduścaritasya,
SA20n1387:3468: kāntaṃ priyaṃ mana āpaṃ tadanena tasminsamaye pratilabdhaṃ bhavati |
SA20n1387:3478: iti tānyāpakāntāni śīlānyadhipatiṃ kṛtvā mārgabhāvanākāle yāvatpravartate |
SA20n1387:3479: yacca kāyakarma yaścājīvaḥ tepi samyagvākkarmāntājīvā ityucyante |
SA20n1387:3489: yaccatvāri smṛtyupasthānānyadhipatiṃ kṛtvā aviparyāyasaṃgṛhītā smṛtiḥ navākārā navākāracittasthitisaṃgrāhikā[ | ]
SA20n1387:3492: tadetatsarvvamabhisamasya āryāṣṭāṃgo mārgaścārakaraṇīye ca vihārakaraṇīye cāvasthitaḥ |
SA20n1387:3499: tatra yā ca samyaksamṛtiryaśca samyaksamādhisyaṃ śamathaḥ |
SA20n1387:3505: jñānamātrapratibaddhavastudarśanamārgaḥ jñānotpattimātreṇa kleśān prajahātyanena kāraṇena vākkarmāntājīvā bhāvanāmārge vyavasthāpitāḥ |
SA20n1387:3506: iti ya evameṣāmanayā ānupūrvyā saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhapakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāmabhyāsaḥ, paricayaḥ |
SA20n1387:3518: api ca pūrvvotpannasya mārgasya paścādutpanno mārgaḥ |
SA20n1387:3524: tadyathā nirvvastukānāṃ kleśānāmapāyagamanahetubhūtānāṃ prahāṇātpratipakṣotpādācca srota āpattiphalaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ |
SA20n1387:3531: yayā yamādita eva na prayutyata ityādita u[t]trāsikā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ |
SA20n1387:3537: api svābhyāsāttasya yāvad yathābhūtadarśanaṃ na bhavati |
SA20n1387:3541: tasyāsya srota āpannasya paraṃ sapta bhavā avaśiṣṭā bhavanti |
SA20n1387:3548: iha pratyāgamajanmikaṃ kleśaṃ prahāya tadā anāgāmiphalaṃ vyavasthāpyate ||
SA20n1387:3550: tatpunaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇādrāgadveṣamohānāṃ ca |
SA20n1387:3563: ayaṃ tveṣāṃ viśeṣo rāgādicaritaḥ prayujyamānaścireṇādhigantā bhavati |
SA20n1387:3567: samabhāgacaritasya pudgalasya mandarajaskasya ca katamāni liṃgāni |
SA20n1387:3569: samabhāgacaritasya pudgalasya sarvvāṇi tāni liṃgāni saṃvidyante |
SA20n1387:3573: tathā rāgādicaritānāṃ samaprāptāni bhavanti pratyayeṣu satsu na prajñāyante |
SA20n1387:3591: yā dṛṣṭe dharme caritaviśodhanenālambanaviśodhanena na śakyate viśodhayituṃ |
SA20n1387:3595: tatropapatro jāto bhavatyeḍamūko hastasaṃbādhikaḥ apratibalo bhavati |
SA20n1387:3603: adhimuktisaṃprayogāddhi tamāryā[a]śāṭhyatayā sucintita dharmārthasya niḥkāṃkṣanirvicikitsāprayoganiryāṇatayā yā dṛṣṭiḥ śraddhayā saṃprayuktā |
SA20n1387:3604: asmāddharma vinayādasaṃhāryādadhimuktyā ca saṃprayuktā buddhānāṃ buddhaśrāvakāṇāṃ ca |
SA20n1387:3610: vigatamāyāśāṭhyā ca yā dṛṣṭiḥ yayā ṛjuko bhavati |
SA20n1387:3630: tatra puṇyasabhāro yenāpyetarhi ānulomikāḥ pariṣkārāḥ prādurābhavanti |
SA20n1387:3668: yathoktaṃ śramaṇālaṃkāre tairayaṃ prakṛtyaiva samanvāgato bhavati |
SA20n1387:3669: itīmānyevaṃ bhāgīyāni mandarajaskasya pudgalasya liṃgāni veditavyāni ||
SA20n1387:3694: darśanabhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ kleśānāṃ vijayāttatra tathāgato bodhisattvaścāyatyāṃ bodhāya pratipannāḥ |
SA20n1387:3701: tatra ye pṛthagjanakalyāṇakā ātmahitāya pratipannā śajjinaḥ (mārgadeśikāḥ) |
SA20n1387:3703: aprāptasya prāptaye anadhigatasyādhigamāya āsākṣātkṛtasya sākṣātkriyāyai prayuktā,
SA20n1387:3710: tatra yoyaṃ pudgalo duḥśīlaḥ pāpadharmā yāvadabrahamacārī [brahmacārī] (ri) pratijñaḥ |
SA20n1387:3711: ayamucyate mārgadūṣī dūṣitonena mārgo bhavati mūlata āditaḥ |
SA20n1387:3732: tatra saṃjñābrāhmaṇa iti loke nāma bhavati,
SA20n1387:3749: tatra tadantaraprahāyī yo laukikena mārgeṇa kāmavītarāgaḥ pṛthagjanaḥ |
SA20n1387:3785: api ca pravrājayatyātmanaḥ pāpakānakuśalān dharmān sa pravrajita ityucyate |
SA20n1387:3806: sa tāvadupāyajñopi sātatikopi kṛtaparicayopi nārādhako bhavati |
SA20n1387:3818: sātatikaḥ, kṛtaparicayaśca bhavatyevaṃ sa ārādhako bhavati |
SA20n1387:3848: yena naiva vā śaknoti maraṇadharmmatāṃ samatikramitum ||
SA20n1387:3865: yasya raṃjanīyeṣu rūpeṣu sahagatvarasampraṣṭavyadharmeṣu nimittagrāhitāyāmanuvyaṃjanagrāhitāyāṃ cittaṃ praskandati |
SA20n1387:3867: evaṃ bhojaneṣu mātrajñasya viharataḥ praṇīteṣu raseṣu chandarāgamanunayena cittaṃ praskandati |
SA20n1387:3868: bhaktavaiṣamye evaṃ pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ jāgarikāyo gamananuyuktasya viharataḥ |
SA20n1387:3874: abhikramapratikramādiṣu śiśumudāravarṇṇaṃ raṃjanīyaṃ mātṛgrāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā ayoniśo nimittagrāheṇa cittaṃ praskandati |
SA20n1387:3909: itīmānyevaṃbhāgīyāni mārakarmāṇi veditavyāni tāni caturṇṇāṃ mārāṇāṃ yathāyogaṃ ||
SA20n1387:3930: samādhiśca balavānevama syārambhaḥ saphalo bhavatyebhistribhiḥ kāraṇairviphalo bhavati |
